Key Match Events: Moustafa Mashal scored the opening goal for Qatar in the 4th minute
Almoez Ali scored the second goal for Qatar in the 46th minute
Yusuf Abdurisag scored the third goal for Qatar in the 85th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Igor Stimac made five changes to the starting line-up from the first match
Amrinder Singh, who replaced Gurpreet Singh Sandhu in goal, wasn't at his best today
Miscellaneous Highlights: Qatar obtained 10 corners in the first half and India got none
India had to weather one attack after another till the 40th minute but improved towards the end of that half
Others: India went down 0-3 in their second match of the FIFA World Cup 2026 and AFC Asian Cup Saudi Arabia 2027 Joint Qualification campaign
The match took place at Kalinga Stadium
